v8:item.v8:content: Bază de alegere: Nu a fost gasit

Settings.QueryText: SELECT Counterparties.Ref AS Ref, Counterparties.IsFolder, Counterparties.Description AS Description, Counterparties.Code AS Code, Counterparties.DescriptionFull AS FullDescr, Counterparties.LegalEntityIndividual, Counterparties.TIN, Counterparties.CIO, Counterparties.BankAccountByDefault, Counterparties.ContractByDefault, Counterparties.Individual, Counterparties.Responsible AS ResponsibleManager, Counterparties.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, Counterparties.CodeByOKPO, Counterparties.Comment FROM Catalog.Counterparties AS Counterparties {WHERE Counterparties.Ref AS Search}

v8:item.v8:content: Index de căutare full-text este relevant
Reflection mode before the full-text search application
Режим отображения до применения полнотекстового поиска
Mod de reflecție înainte de aplicarea de căutare full-text
